entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
